Module movieManagementSystem
Package sait.mms.contracts

Interface DatabaseDriver

All Known Implementing Classes:
MariaDBDriver
public interface DatabaseDriver
The Interface for connecting the database to the program COntains the signatures of the Connect, get(query), update, and disconnect methods
Version:
April 17, 2022
Author:
Mahdiyeh

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    connect()
    Connects the Java program to the relative database
    void

    Disconnects the program from the relational database

    Gets the query and passes it to the database

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect() throws SQLException
      Connects the Java program to the relative database
      Throws:
      SQLException - when the program could not connect to the database

    • disconnect

      void disconnect() throws SQLException
      Disconnects the program from the relational database
      Throws:
      SQLException - when the program cannot disconnect from the database

    • get

      ResultSet get(String query) throws SQLException
      Gets the query and passes it to the database
      Parameters:
      query - query that is set to execute
      Returns:
      result sets from the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was an error processing the request

    • update

      int update(String query) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      query - query that is set to update the database
      Returns:
      the number of rows that were effected
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there was an error
